definitions.definition: To make magnetic.
To become magnetic.
To hypnotize using mesmerism.
To attract, allure or entice; to captivate or entrance.
A thicket of bushes or other shrubbery, especially one planted as a fence between two portions of land, or to separate the parts of a garden.
definitions.example: He trims the hedge once a week.

definitions.definition: A barrier (often consisting of a line of persons or objects) to protect someone or something from harm.
A mound of earth, stone- or turf-faced, often topped with bushes, used as a fence between any two portions of land.
A non-committal or intentionally ambiguous statement.
Contract or arrangement reducing one's exposure to risk (for example the risk of price movements or interest rate movements).
definitions.example: A hedge is an investment position intended to offset potential losses/gains that may be incurred by a companion investment. In simple language, a hedge is used to reduce any substantial losses/gains suffered by an individual or an organization.

definitions.definition: (noun adjunct) Used attributively, with figurative indication of a person's upbringing, or professional activities, taking place by the side of the road; third-rate.
To enclose with a hedge or hedges.
definitions.example: to hedge a field or garden

definitions.definition: To obstruct or surround.
To offset the risk associated with.
To avoid verbal commitment.
definitions.example: He carefully hedged his statements with weasel words.

definitions.definition: To construct or repair a hedge.
To reduce one's exposure to risk.
Pomp, show, or festivity.
A showy and festive party.
Celebratory; festive.
A member of an androgynous class of priests of the Sumerian goddess Inanna.
(law enforcement) Perpetrator.
definitions.example: "We have the perp in custody," the policeman said.

definitions.definition: At or forming a right angle (to something).
definitions.example: In most houses, the walls are perpendicular to the floor.

definitions.definition: Exactly upright; extending in a straight line toward the centre of the earth, etc.
Independent of or irrelevant to each other; orthogonal.
A large window at the front of a shop, behind which items for sale are displayed.
An electronic measuring instrument that creates a visible two-dimensional graph, on a screen, of one or more continuously varying voltages or currents.
A soft moist mixture, in particular:
A substance that behaves as a solid until a sufficiently large load or stress is applied, at which point it flows like a fluid
A hard lead-containing glass, or an artificial gemstone made from this glass.
Pasta.
The mineral substance in which other minerals are embedded.
To stick with paste; to cause to adhere by or as if by paste.
To insert a piece of media (e.g. text, picture, audio, video) previously copied or cut from somewhere else.
To strike or beat someone or something.
To defeat decisively or by a large margin.
Obstinate and stubborn to the point of stupidity.
Lasting throughout the whole day.

definitions.definition: Available throughout the whole day.

definitions.definition: The grasping of hands by two people when greeting, leave-taking, or making an agreement.
An exchange of signals between two devices when communications begin in order to ensure synchronization.
To perform a handshake; to shake hands.
To perform a handshake with another device.
A game similar to baseball but played with a larger and softer ball which can be thrown overhand or underhand.
The ball used to play the sport.
(by analogy) A question designed to be easy to answer.
A large farm; estate or area of land designated for agricultural growth. Often includes housing for the owner and workers.
An area where trees are planted for commercial purposes.
The importation of large numbers of workers and soldiers to displace the local population, such as in medieval Ireland and in the Americas; colonization.
A colony established thus.
A heated cooking pan or appliance used to deep-fry foods.
To cook (food) by deep-frying.
Canonical
To cast anchor or become fastened.
To fix or secure (e.g. a vessel) in a particular place by casting anchor, or by fastening with ropes, cables or chains or the like

definitions.definition: To secure or fix firmly.
A place to moor a vessel.
The act of securing a vessel with a cable or anchor etc.
Something to which one adheres, or the means that helps one to maintain a stable position and keep one's identity - moral, intellectual, political, etc.
A rope that has been coiled into a neat mat; a flemish coil.
To coil a rope into a neat pattern on the deck of a ship.
A device that produces and radiates heat, typically to raise the temperature of a room or building.
definitions.example: Turn on the heater; I'm cold.

definitions.definition: A person who heats something, for example in metalworking.
A gun.
definitions.example: The thug pumped two rounds from his heater into her.

definitions.definition: A fastball, especially one thrown at high velocity.
definitions.example: Jones threw a heater under his chin.

definitions.definition: An extended winning streak.
definitions.example: Emmy went on a heater in Las Vegas and came back six thousand dollars richer.

definitions.definition: A medieval European shield having a rounded triangle shape like a clothes iron.
(of food) Containing no gluten.
(of a person) not eating gluten
A rank in the classification of organisms, below kingdom and above class; also called a division, especially in describing plants; a taxon at that rank
definitions.example: Mammals belong to the phylum Chordata.

definitions.definition: A large division of possibly related languages, or a major language family which is not subordinate to another.
Quality time.
A unit of liquid capacity equal to two pints; one-fourth (quarter) of a gallon. Equivalent to 1.136 liters in the UK and 0.946 liter (liquid quart) or 1.101 liters (dry quart) in the U.S.
Four successive cards of the same suit.
A fourth; a quarter; hence, a region of the earth.
The absence of sound; quietness.

definitions.definition: The absence of movement; stillness, tranquility
A cute person or animal.
A clementine: a small, waxy-peeled orange hybrid cultivar that is easy to peel by hand.
(by extension) Any small mandarin orange variety such as a tangerine or a satsuma.

The totality of intensions, that is, attributes, characters, marks, properties, or qualities, that the object possesses, or else the totality of intensions that are pertinent to the context of a given discussion.

The inclusion of nonconformists within the Church of England.
A place or service that allows intravenous drug users to obtain new hypodermic needles at little or no cost, often in exchange for used ones.

Ornate, intricate, decorated, laden with detail.
Complex and beautiful, despite an outward irregularity.
Chiseled from stone, or shaped from wood, in a garish, crooked, twisted, or slanted sort of way, grotesque.

An act of rescinding: removing, taking away, or taking back.
The undoing of a contract; repeal.

An interruption; something interjected
Any small-scale verbal or physical interaction between those of different races, cultures, beliefs, or genders that may have no malicious intent, but that can be interpreted as an aggression.
A lively Brazilian dance that is similar to the samba.
The music of that dance.
A permanent military post.
The troops stationed at such a post.

definitions.definition: To attend to one's appearance and clothing.

Tending toward excessive moralization.

definitions.definition: A person who can function effectively with others in a group, sharing information and striving towards a common goal.

An immature member of a species.
Occurring before the proper time; untimely, premature (especially of death).
Not fully formed or developed; not grown.

A certificate that certifies an amount of money owed to someone; a certificate of indebtedness.
A certificate of a loan made to the government; a government bond.

A type of debt instrument secured only by the general credit or promise to pay of the issuer, not involving any physical assets or collateral, now commonly issued by large, well established corporations with adequate credit ratings.
A document granting lenders a charge over a borrower’s physical assets, giving them a means to collect a debt, as part of a secured loan.
Someone who owns a house

A point, near, or within a body at which the object's mass can be assumed to be concentrated; it coincides with the centroid for a body of uniform density, and with the centre of gravity in a uniform gravitational field.
A piece of office furniture composed of drawers or shelves sized to standard file folder widths, traditionally used for storing documents in order.
(game of go) A local shape to which the ko rule applies; a ko shape.

Representing the latest and most advanced style.
Someone who wishes to be or do something, but lacks the qualifications or talent; an overeager amateur; an aspirant.

Preserved in cans.

definitions.definition: Drunk.
Terminated, fired from a job.

definitions.definition: A complaint, often a petty or trivial one.

A vulture, Gyps fulvus; the griffin.
